items.summary: Fix and standardize the global design tokens so Tailwind color utilities (e.g., `text-secondary`, `bg-secondary`, `border-secondary`, `ring-secondary`, `bg-accent`) reliably resolve to the intended teal values across the app, eliminating any conflicting/duplicate CSS variable definitions that prevent teal accents from appearing consistently.

Update frontend styling (Tailwind classes and/or design variables only) so teal accents are applied consistently to the site logo/wordmark, Lucide icons (where not semantic), buttons (including outline/secondary variants), and other interactive elements, without changing component behavior or introducing new UI components.

Replace the hero/header background image with the user-provided image URL and adjust the hero background positioning to be bottom-justified (e.g., `background-position: bottom` / `center bottom`) while preserving existing overlay and text readability.
Add the new hero image as a static frontend asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and reference it from the hero section implementation (do not serve the image from the backend).
